statements: DELETE FROM pharmaceutical_compliance_documents WHERE document_owner = 'John Doe' AND document_type = 'Audit' AND document_status = 'Approved';
DELETE FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_id = 101 AND document_status = 'Approved';
DELETE FROM product_regulations WHERE regulation_id = 202 AND compliance_status = 'Non-compliant';
DELETE FROM regulatory_documents WHERE document_id = 5 AND document_type = 'Legal';
DELETE FROM product_information WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31' AND manufacturer_name = 'ABC Inc';
DELETE FROM product_documents WHERE product_id = 5 AND version = 2;
